author: nicko
msg: Added link to MS KB on event log permissions. For internal debug added info on how to redirect to file. Both from Ron

author: nicko
msg: Fix LOG4NET-25. Ensure that m_scheduledFilename is not built until after File has been set to fully qualified path

author: nicko
msg: Fix LOG4NET-42: Serialised LoggingEvent does not preserve the Fix flags. Added new constructors to allow FixFlags to be passed in with the LoggingEventData

author: nicko
msg: Fix for LOG4NET-40 RollingFileAppender does not limit files to MaxSizeRollBackups when CountDirection is 1

author: nicko
msg: Fix for LOG4NET-33. Added code to look for the AppSetting 'log4net.Config' when configuring the default repository. If located it is loaded as a URI relative to the application base directory.
